trans-unit.source: Describes the behavior that caused a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Descreve o comportamento que causou uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"> </xref> evento para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The page buttons are not visible as buttons, but they occupy the space between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls on either end of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Os botões de página não são visíveis como botões, mas eles ocupam espaço entre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>e os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>controles em ambas as extremidades de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The user clicks a page button when clicking the left mouse button between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.
trans-unit.target: O usuário clica em um botão de página ao clicar no botão esquerdo do mouse entre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The result of this action is to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> in the direction of the page button.
trans-unit.target: O resultado dessa ação é mover o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>na direção do botão página.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the effect of the page buttons, see the descriptions of the LargeIncrement and LargeDecrement members.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o efeito dos botões de página, consulte as descrições dos membros LargeIncrement e LargeDecrement.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, including the page buttons.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra os elementos de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, incluindo os botões de página.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: ![The different parts of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "The different parts of a ScrollBar")
trans-unit.target: ![As diferentes partes de uma barra de rolagem](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "as diferentes partes de uma barra de rolagem")

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> was dragged to a new position and is now no longer being dragged by the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> foi arrastado para uma nova posição e não mais agora está sendo arrastado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum*> position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movido para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum*>posição do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the CTRL+HOME keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, essa movimentação ocorre quando pressionadas as teclas CTRL + HOME.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand"></xref> in a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand"></xref> in a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Essa movimentação corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand"> </xref> na vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> e um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand"> </xref> em um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, to the left for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or upward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movido uma distância especificada, conforme determinado pelo valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, à esquerda de um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> ou para cima para vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button that is above the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, or when the PAGE UP key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, essa movimentação ocorre quando o botão de página que está acima do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> é pressionado, ou quando a chave de página anterior for pressionada e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button to the left of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, essa movimentação ocorre quando a página do botão à esquerda do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> é pressionado e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, to the right for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or downward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movido uma distância especificada, conforme determinado pelo valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, à direita de um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> ou para baixo para vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button that is below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, or when the PAGE DOWN key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, essa movimentação ocorre quando o botão de página que está abaixo do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> é pressionado, ou quando a tecla PAGE DOWN é pressionada e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button to the right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, essa movimentação ocorre quando a página do botão à direita do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> é pressionado e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*> position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movido para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*>posição do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the CTRL+END keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, essa movimentação ocorre quando pressionadas as teclas CTRL + END.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand"></xref> in a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand"></xref> in a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Essa movimentação corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand"> </xref> na vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> e um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand"> </xref> em um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, to the left for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or upward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movido uma pequena distância, conforme determinado pelo valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, à esquerda de um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> ou para cima para vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the upper <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed or when the UP ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, essa movimentação ocorre quando o superior <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> é pressionado ou quando a tecla de seta para cima é pressionada e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the left <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, essa movimentação ocorre quando esquerda <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> é pressionado e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, to the right for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or downward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movido uma pequena distância, conforme determinado pelo valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, à direita de um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> ou para baixo para vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the lower <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed or when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, essa movimentação ocorre quando menor <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> é pressionado ou quando a tecla de seta para baixo é pressionada e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the right <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, essa movimentação ocorre quando o direito de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> é pressionado e corresponde a um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to a new position because the user selected **Scroll Here** in the shortcut menu of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> movido para uma nova posição porque o usuário selecionou **rolagem aqui** no menu de atalho a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Essa movimentação corresponde do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To view the shortcut menu, right-click the mouse when the pointer is over the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir o menu de atalho, clique com botão direito do mouse quando o ponteiro está sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> was dragged and caused a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> foi arrastado e fez uma <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event of this ScrollEventType may occur more than one time when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is dragged in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"> </xref> este ScrollEventType evento pode ocorrer mais de uma hora em que o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> é arrastado <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
